# Stock

  • BucketListly Photos — Creative commons photos tagged by country.

  • Coverr — Free stock videos for your homepage.

  • DesignersPics — Free high-res photos for use.

  • FreePhotos.cc — Free stock and royalty-free images.

  • Freesound.org — Database of Creative Commons-licensed sounds.

  • Gratisography — High-resolution photographs.

  • Mazwai — Free stock video snippets.

  • Pexels Photos — Free stock photos - public domain and CC.

  • Pexels Videos — Free stock videos.

  • Pixeden — Free designer graphics.

  • Public Domain Images Archive — Free public domain stock photos.

  • Skuawk — Curated public domain photos.

  • Stock Music — Royalty-free music.

  • Stock Up — 15,000+ indexed photos from over 30 different stock photography sites.

  • Superfamous — Stock landscape photos with a CC license.

  • The Pattern Library — Free pattern images.

  • Unsplash — High-resolution photos.

  • Vastpic — Free high-res photos.

  • Videvo — Free stock motion graphics and video.

  • Vimeo — Free HD stock footage.

  • VisualHunt — Free high-quality stock photos from many different sites.

  • Audio Library — Browse and download free music and sound effects.

  • Your Vector Maps — Site with a bunch of links to vector-based maps and shapefiles of the whole Earth. Good for building things in Illustrator or Sketch or the web.

Help me improve this page!
